about_the_game:
Welcome to Store Keeper—a game where you take on the role of a warehouse manager for a retail store! Your job isn’t just about storing goods; you’ll have full control over their journey, from arrival at the warehouse to placement on store shelves and into customers’ hands.

Key Features:

🔹 Receiving and Inspecting Shipments


Monitor incoming deliveries, verify invoices, identify supplier errors, and decide how to handle defective or surplus goods. Every mistake can be costly, but attention to detail will help you avoid losses.

🔹 Warehouse Space Management


Optimize product placement to simplify the work of store staff and minimize losses. Improve your warehouse layout, organize work areas, and boost employee efficiency.

🔹 Maintaining Proper Storage Conditions
Some products require special conditions: perishable goods must be stored in refrigerators, while others need to be kept in freezers!

🔹 Sales Analysis and Inventory Management
Track which products are in high demand and which are sitting in storage for too long. Plan shelf layouts wisely to prevent stock shortages or an overfilled warehouse with unsold goods.

Can you become a true master of warehouse management and build a perfectly efficient system? Test your skills in Store Keeper!

name: Store Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1030 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
